main event: An unidentified flying object was observed changing color from red to white in Rock Springs, Wyoming, on December 29, 1953.
interesting points: The object changed color from red to white, possibly indicating a heated surface or a blinking light,It was observed in a formation with another object, four miles apart,The object's speed was estimated to be between 1500 and 2000 mph,The sighting lasted for approximately 7 minutes,The total evaluation concluded insufficient data due to vague information.
witness description: observed from a C-47 military aircraft
